net.sf.jclec.algorithm.classic

Class CHC

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
      • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.PopulationAlgorithm
        • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.classic.CHC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IAlgorithm, IConfigure, IPopulation, ISystem, JCLEC, IRandGenFactory

    public class CHC
extends PopulationAlgorithm
    CHC algorithm. This implementation allows non-binary individuals. To do that, user has to define the distance to use in the incest prevention phase, as well as the recombinator to use in the generation phase and the mutator to use in the restarting phase (optional).
    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
